#Overview
This project brings together several traditionally separate fields of research:

*  General learning theories
*  Educational research specific to STEM fields
*  Writing in the disciplines, and technical writing instruction
*  Text analysis and classification

Instead of trying to weave a coherent one-page narrative of these very different fields, I have provided links out to sub-pages for each of the various background topics. Follow the links for details.
